configuration:
fs.defaultFS #默认 hdfs://hadoop000:9000 #hdfs的api接口
hadoop.tmp.dir #hadoop运行时产生临时数据的存储目录 /home/hadoop/hadoop/tmp #该目录的地址
hadoop.proxyuser.hadoop.hosts *
hadoop.proxyuser.hadoop.groups *
hadoop.proxyuser.hue.hosts *
hadoop.proxyuser.hue.groups *
hadoop.proxyuser.hdfs.hosts *
hadoop.proxyuser.hdfs.groups *
hadoop.proxyuser.hbase.hosts *
hadoop.proxyuser.hbase.groups *
#web页面的验证
hadoop.http.filter.initializers org.apache.hadoop.security.AuthenticationFilterInitializer
hadoop.http.authentication.type simple
hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity 3600
hadoop.http.authentication.signature.secret.file /home/hadoop/hadoop/hadoop-http-auth-signature-secret
hadoop.http.authentication.cookie.domain
hadoop.http.authentication.simple.anonymous.allowed false
